use.flag: Rename calc to scalc for compatibility with sci-mathematics/calc
Rename compare to scompare for compatibility with imagemagick
Rename count to scount for compatibility with sys-devel/llvm
Rename count to scount for compatibility with sys-devel/llvm
Rename jsh to sjsh for compatibility with app-shells/heirloom-sh
Rename man2html to sman2html for compatibility with sys-apps/man
Rename some manpages from libschily for compatibility with sys-apps/man
Rename p to sp for compatibility with dev-util/wiggle
Install bosh, a shell which aims to be fully POSIX compatible
Install calc, a bc clone
Install calltree, a cflow clone
Install programs provided by app-cdr/cdrtools
Install change, a program to change patterns in files
Install compare, a cmp clone
Install copy, a cp clone
Install count, a wc clone
Install cpp, a C preprocessor
Install Cstyle, a C-codingstyle lint
Install scut, a cut clone
Install hdump, a hexdump clone
Install label, a sun disk label manipulator
Install lndir, a program for creating symlinked directory trees
Install a man2html clone
Install manpages about the schily makefile system
Install match, a grep clone
Install mdigest, e.g. covering md5sum sha*sum
Install mountcd, a solaris CD comparison tool
Install obosh (formerly: osh), the original sVr4 (SunOS 5) shell with original bugs
Install p, a more program which filters non-printable characters
Install pbosh, a shell which implements all POSIX features but only those (compatbilitiy testing!)
Install spaste, a paste clone
Install spatch, a patch clone
Install pxupgrade: upgrading firmware in Plextor CD/DVD writers
Install sfind, a source code control system
Install sfind, a find clone
Install smake, a make clone
Install programs provided by app-arch/star
Install termcap, a termcap compiler
Install translit, a tr clone
Install udiff, a diff clone
Install ved, a visual editor with features from vi and emacs
Install rscsi as SUID root
